name: Dinosaur Simulator Unlimited
description:
A Dinosaur is causing massive damage to a city and guess who is in control? This game includes Dilophosaurus, Raptor, and of course Tyrannosaurus Rex. Loaded with fun sounds and awesome effects, this game will put you in control of these huge creatures. Smash into cars, planes, fire hydrants, people, and anything else not attached to the ground. Help this Dino from a Baby Dino in Level 1 to a Giant Dinosaur in Level 200. This game combines elements of rampage style games with adventure games. Complete all 48 missions and over 20 achievements. Try to rank in the Top 10 in the world!

Features:
--Dilophosaurus, Raptor, and Trex included!
--4 Huge Maps
--48 Missions
--Loads of achievements
--World Rankings of your Dinosaur
--Combines rampage with adventure
--Excellent 3D graphics and fast gameplay
--The more you play, the more he grows

If you ever wondered what it would be like to take control of a Dinosaur, this is your chance.

If you want more time per level, and more dynamite per round, you can upgrade to the PRO version.

Notes: At this point, level 200 is max size for the dino - -and he will be a Super Giant at level 200. This app works best on newer devices.

Connect with us @jellyfishgiant

Enjoy!
